translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
♪ Sun down! Monsters up! ♪
Woah! That's a lot of decorations!
[giggle] And that's a lot of twinkle lights!
Oh! These twinkle lights are so tangled, even the knots have knots!
Don't worry, Igor, we'll help you untangle the lights!
translation.ko: 걱정 마세요 저희가 푸는 걸 도와드릴게요

translation.en: And we'll help you hang them up too.
But first, we need to untangle you! [giggle]
Oh! Thanks, kiddos. [chuckles] I'm not sure how this happened!
translation.ko: 고맙다, 얘들아 어쩌다 이렇게 됐는지 모르겠네

translation.en: -It's OK. -We've got this.
[Igor] Oh! Ho, ho, ho.
Merry Christmas, everyone!
Spike, it isn't quite Christmas yet. It's still Christmas Eve!
Oh, OK! Merry Christmas Eve, everyone!
[all laughing] Merry Christmas Eve, Spike!
translation.ko: - 메리 크리스마스이브, 스파이크! - 메리 크리스마스이브, 스파이크!

translation.en: Santa always says that... Oh!
...twinkle lights and decorations really put him in the holiday spirit!
translation.ko: 전구와 장식을 보면 힘이 난다고 했지

translation.en: Tonight, I want to try and make Santa the biggest,
brightest,
holiday display ever!
We can use our superpowers to help!
Aha! I can't wait to get started!
Well, you won't have to wait much longer look!
translation.ko: 오래 기다리지 않아도 된단다 저기 보렴

translation.en: Sun down! [all] Monsters up!
Drac!
Katya.
Lobo!
Zoe.
Frankie!
Cleo!
Spike!
Vida!
[all] Super Monsters!
Igor, I know Santa loves holiday decorations...
-He sure does! -But, remember,
translation.ko: 아주 좋아하지! 크리스마스를 즐기는 다른 방법도 많단 걸 잊지 마세요

translation.en: there are other ways to celebrate the holiday too...
translation.ko: 크리스마스를 즐기는 다른 방법도 많단 걸 잊지 마세요

translation.en: Well of course there are! But...
with the Super Monsters using all their powers to help me decorate the school,
translation.ko: 하지만 슈퍼 몬스터들이 초능력으로 장식하는 걸 도와준다면

translation.en: this year will be the biggest and brightest celebration
translation.ko: 올해는 산타에게 가장 크고 밝은 장식을

translation.en: Santa's ever seen! Oh, he's going to love it!
translation.ko: 보여 줄 수 있을 거야! 정말정말 좋아할 거란다

translation.en: Igor, how many of these twinkle lights do you want us to put up?
translation.ko: 이고르 선생님 전구는 얼마나 달면 될까요?

translation.en: All of them!
[Katya] All of them? Really?
[giggle] OK!
Does that mean we should use all of these decorations too?
translation.ko: 그럼 여기 있는 장식도 다 써도 되는 거예요?

translation.en: Of course! Only the best for Santa!
On it! Mega-size! Let's start over there!
♪ Here with our friends Working together we have fun ♪
♪ Come, give a hand That is the way we get things done ♪
♪ Working together We're Super Monsters ♪
translation.ko: 다 함께 모여 우리 슈퍼 몬스터 나간다

translation.en: ♪ Here we come We're all in together ♪
translation.ko: 우리 슈퍼 몬스터 나간다 함께 배우고 놀면서 일해

translation.en: ♪ We work and play That's how we get things done ♪
translation.ko: 함께 배우고 놀면서 일해 그런 게 좋아, 단다다다라!

translation.en: ♪ Tan, tan, ta-ran ♪
It looks amazing!
Thanks, Katya. Um... Zoe, how do we get out of here?
translation.ko: 고마워, 카트야! 조이, 여기서 어떻게 나가지?

translation.en: -This way! -[both laughing]
-[Katya] That's all the twinkle lights! -[Cleo] Beautiful! -[Spike] We did it. -[Frankie] Santa's going to love it.
Well done, Super Monsters! That's everything we had in the attic.
translation.ko: 잘했다, 얘들아 창고에 있던 장식을 전부 다 썼구나

translation.en: Now, let's put up these decorations from the basement!
translation.ko: 이제 지하에서 가져온 장식을 써 보자꾸나

translation.en: But there isn't anything left to decorate!
translation.ko: 하지만 더 이상 꾸밀 게 없는데요?

translation.en: Oh, there is one thing left. And it wouldn't be Christmas without it...
translation.ko: 아직 하나 남았단다 이게 없으면 크리스마스가 아니지

translation.en: [all cheering] The Christmas Tree!
I'll get it! Mega-size!
Here it is!
Igor, before we decorate the tree, can we turn on the other decorations?
translation.ko: 이고르 선생님, 장식하기 전에 방금 꾸민 것부터 봐도 돼요?

translation.en: Aww! I can't wait to see everything all lit up!
translation.ko: 전부 다 불이 켜진 걸 빨리 보고 싶어요! - 네, 보고 싶어요 - 저도요!

translation.en: Of course we can!
Frankie, I'll turn on the twinkle lights,
if you'll power up the rest of the decorations.
-Ready? -Ready!
translation.ko: 준비됐지? 그럼요! 프랭키 매시로 힘껏 내리쳐

translation.en: Frankie-mash, monster-smash!
Uh-huh! We did it!
Uh-oh, that's not good.
Oh, no! My monster-smash blew out the lights!
translation.ko: 제가 프랭키 매시로 불을 다 꺼 버렸어요!

translation.en: No, Frankie, this wasn't your fault!
I should have known that all those extra lights and decorations
would take too much power, but I did it anyway.
translation.ko: 전기가 끊어진다는 걸 알아야 했는데 그냥 해 버렸네

translation.en: And look what happened.
I ruined Christmas for everyone!
translation.ko: 내가 모두의 크리스마스를 망쳐 놓은 거야

translation.en: -Poor Igor! -He's really upset.
translation.ko: - 불쌍한 이고르 선생님 - 많이 속상하신가 봐

translation.en: We should go find him. Maybe we can help him feel better.
translation.ko: 어서 가 보자 우리가 위로할 수 있을지도 몰라

translation.en: Good idea, Frankie.
[Katya] Igor, where are you? Where'd he go?
translation.ko: - 이고르 선생님, 어디 계세요? - 어디로 가셨지?

translation.en: -Not in there. -Not here either.
translation.ko: 여긴 안 계셔 여기도 안 계셔

translation.en: [Cleo] Found him!
Igor? We've been looking for you.
We were worried about you!
-Are you OK? -I'm sorry, Super Monsters.
I got so carried away with trying to make the biggest,
translation.ko: 세상에서 가장 크고 밝은 크리스마스 장식을 만들겠다는 생각에 사로잡히는 바람에

translation.en: brightest holiday display ever...
that I blew out all the power and I ruined Christmas!
translation.ko: 전기를 모두 나가게 해 버렸어요 내가 크리스마스를 망친 거야

translation.en: It's OK, Igor! Everybody makes mistakes.
translation.ko: - 괜찮아요, 이고르 선생님 - 누구나 실수는 하는걸요

translation.en: Oh! Thank you, kiddos.
And you didn't ruin Christmas. We can still decorate the tree!
translation.ko: - 아직 망친 것도 아니에요 - 트리는 장식할 수 있잖아요

translation.en: But... no one will be able to see it in the dark.
translation.ko: 하지만 너무 어두워서 아무도 못 볼 거야

translation.en: Don't worry, Igor, we'll find a way to make it special.
translation.ko: 걱정 마세요, 이고르 선생님 저희가 특별하게 만들 수 있어요

translation.en: I bet my dad will know how to fix the power!
translation.ko: 우리 아빠가 전기를 고칠 줄 아실 거예요

translation.en: I just called him! Mr. Mash is on his way!
translation.ko: 방금 전화드렸단다 매쉬 씨께서 지금 오신대요

translation.en: Oh, that's great!
Maybe he can turn the lights back on before Santa gets here!
translation.ko: 산타가 여기 오기 전에 불을 다시 켤 수 있겠어

translation.en: It looks like somebody got their power working.
translation.ko: 누가 벌써 전기를 고친 것 같아요, 저기요!

translation.en: Over there! See those twinkly lights?
translation.ko: 누가 벌써 전기를 고친 것 같아요, 저기요! 저기 전구 보여요?

translation.en: -Those aren't twinkly lights! -They're fire dragonflies!
Come on, Spike! Let's go!
-Ready, Spike? -Ready, Cleo!
-Wow! Awesome! -Beautiful!
♪ We lay together around the tree And see our best friends there ♪
♪ It's not about the things we have It's about the things we share ♪
translation.ko: 내가 가진 것보다 나누는 게 중요해

translation.en: ♪ Then in turn together. Aha! It's the best time of the year ♪
translation.ko: 우리 같이 놀자 1년 중 제일 좋은 날

translation.en: ♪ How it is so much fun Whenever friends are near ♪
-Igor? What's the matter? -Don't you like the tree?
translation.ko: - 이고르 선생님, 왜 그러세요? - 트리가 마음에 안 드세요?

translation.en: Oh, I don't just like it. I love it!
translation.ko: 마음에 드는 정도가 아니라 너무 좋단다

translation.en: [Santa] Ho, ho, ho! So do I!
[all] Santa Claus!
Igor, my old friend!
I've never seen a more beautiful Christmas tree.
I can tell it was decorated with true Holiday Spirit!
translation.ko: 진정한 크리스마스 분위기다운 정말 훌륭한 트리야

translation.en: It certainly was!
Thank you, Super Monsters.
You reminded me that the most important thing about celebrating the holidays
translation.ko: 너희 덕분에 크리스마스에 정말 중요한 게 뭔지 알게 됐어요

translation.en: isn't how you celebrate it, but who you celebrate it with.
translation.ko: 장식을 어떻게 하느냐보다는 누구와 함께하는지가 더 중요하지

translation.en: I've fixed the power!
You can turn the lights back on as soon as you want.
translation.ko: 이제 원하면 불을 켤 수 있어

translation.en: Thanks, Dad!
But could we leave the lights off just a little while longer?
translation.ko: 그런데 잠깐 불을 안 켠 채로 있어도 될까요?

translation.en: Of course we can, Frankie.
Glorb, you're absolutely right! This tree does need a star on top.
translation.ko: 글로브 그래, 네 말이 맞아! 크리스마스트리 위에는 별이 있어야지

translation.en: Which one would you like?
Really? From up there?
How about that one?
There you go!
Thank you, Santa, it's perfect!
I think it's time to say goodnight!
translation.ko: 이제 슬슬 가 봐야 할 것 같네요

translation.en: And I think it's time to turn the power back on.
Ready, Dad?
[both] Monster-smash!
Thank you, Frankie. And Merry Christmas!
Merry Christmas, Mrs. Carradine!
Well I guess we have to take down some of the lights,
or the power will blow out again.
Poor, Igor, he's so disappointed.
translation.ko: 불쌍한 이고르 선생님 많이 아쉬우신가 봐

translation.en: Dad, isn't there some way we can use our monster powers
to light up all of Igor's decorations?
translation.ko: 전구를 전부 켤 수 있지 않을까요?

translation.en: Well, we can try.
Maybe I can add a little Christmas magic to your monster magic?
translation.ko: 저도 크리스마스 마법을 사용해서 괴물 마법을 같이 도울게요

translation.en: Let's get these decorations powered up.
translation.ko: 우리 같이 전구 장식을 켜 보자꾸나!

translation.en: [both] Monster-smash.
Oh, it's just how I imagined it! Thank you!
translation.ko: - 정말 예쁘다 - 내가 생각했던 그대로야 고맙다, 너희가 내 크리스마스 소원을 들어줬구나

translation.en: You made my holiday wish come true!
translation.ko: 고맙다, 너희가 내 크리스마스 소원을 들어줬구나

translation.en: Maybe we could add a few more lights.
translation.ko: 전구를 몇 개 더 달아도 되지 않을까?

translation.en: [children outraged] Igor!
You know, old friend, I think it looks perfect just the way it is!
translation.ko: 이보게나, 친구 지금 이대로가 가장 완벽해

translation.en: Santa, can you stay for snack time?
Igor made ginger snaps with lemon icing.
Oh, ho! My favorite cookies!
But I really can't stay much longer.
The reindeer and I still have a lot of gifts to deliver.
translation.ko: 사슴들과 나눠 줘야 할 선물이 아직 많이 남았거든

translation.en: Huh! Was that a reindeer?
Were those Santa's reindeer?
-Well, Santa's sleigh is still here. -But what happened to the reindeer?
translation.ko: 산타 할아버지의 썰매는 그대로 있는데 사슴은 어떻게 된 거지?

translation.en: -Someone untied his reins. -Who would do that?
translation.ko: - 누가 사슴들을 풀어 줬어 - 누가 그런 짓을 하지?

translation.en: Oh, ho ho, I think I know who...
[all] Glorb! Henri!
You two are very naughty Monster Pets.
It's OK, Katya. Henri was just being playful.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 카트야 앙리가 장난을 친 것뿐이야 글로브는 글로브니 그럴 수 있지

translation.en: And Glorb was just being Glorb.
translation.ko: 앙리가 장난을 친 것뿐이야 글로브는 글로브니 그럴 수 있지

translation.en: But... what about your reindeer?
Oh, I'm sure they're just having a little fun
translation.ko: 아마 재미있게 놀면서 사슴들이 좋아하는 놀이를

translation.en: and playing one of their reindeer games!
What kind of games do they play?
Their favorite game is Hide and Seek!
Oh! We love playing Hide and Seek!
Don't worry, Santa,
translation.ko: 걱정 마요, 산타 할아버지! 저희가 다 찾아낼 수 있어요

translation.en: I'm sure we can find your reindeer, no matter where they're hiding!
translation.ko: 걱정 마요, 산타 할아버지! 저희가 다 찾아낼 수 있어요 어디에 숨어 있든지요!

translation.en: Come on! We need to get the other Super Monsters and...
[all] Find those reindeer!
translation.ko: - 사슴을 찾으러 가자! - 사슴을 찾으러 가자!

translation.en: Super Monsters, Santa is counting on us. We can't let him down.
translation.ko: 산타 할아버지가 우릴 믿고 계셔 실망하게 해서는 안 돼!

translation.en: Let's go!
-We're sorry, Santa. -We looked everywhere!
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 산타 할아버지 - 여기저기 다 찾아 봤는데... - 찾을 수 없었어요

translation.en: But we can't find them.
translation.ko: - 여기저기 다 찾아 봤는데... - 찾을 수 없었어요

translation.en: I told you they were really good at hiding.
But I need to find them soon,
or I won't have enough time to deliver Christmas presents
translation.ko: 얼른 찾지 못하면 쇠스랑 숲의 모든 아이에게

translation.en: to everyone in Pitchfork Pines!
Oh, no!
You mean our friends could wake up on Christmas morning
and not have any presents?
We can't let that happen.
I'll keep looking for them. They can't have gone too far.
translation.ko: 내가 계속 찾아 보마 그렇게 멀리 가진 않았을 거야

translation.en: If we can't find the reindeer... maybe there's another way we can help.
translation.ko: 사슴을 못 찾는다면 다른 방법으로 도울 수 있을 거야

translation.en: Well, I'm not a flying reindeer,
translation.ko: 내가 하늘을 나는 사슴은 아니지만 하늘을 나는 흡혈귀잖아

translation.en: but I am a flying vampire. Maybe I can pull Santa's sleigh!
translation.ko: 내가 하늘을 나는 사슴은 아니지만 하늘을 나는 흡혈귀잖아 내가 썰매를 끌어도 되겠어

translation.en: Bats! It's too heavy. Let me help you! Roar!
I'll help too. Mummy power!
-[Drac] Watch out! -[Spike] Be careful!
Mega-size! Wow, the sleigh is really heavy,
translation.ko: 초대형 크기! 썰매가 정말 무겁네 이렇게 커졌는데도 말이야

translation.en: even for mega-me.
translation.ko: 썰매가 정말 무겁네 이렇게 커졌는데도 말이야

translation.en: Oh, I have an idea!
Holiday magic bright and shiny, the sleigh is too big, let's make it tiny!
translation.ko: 밝게 빛나는 크리스마스의 마법 썰매가 너무 크니 작게 줄여 주렴

translation.en: OK, the sleigh and I are ready to fly!
translation.ko: 좋아, 이제 썰매 옮길 준비 됐어!

translation.en: That's a great spell, Katya, but won't it make the presents too small?
translation.ko: 굉장한 마법이다, 카트야 근데 그럼 선물이 너무 작지 않나?

translation.en: Oops... good point!
Holiday magic, that wasn't the way, Santa Claus needs a much bigger sleigh!
translation.ko: 크리스마스의 마법아, 그게 아니라 산타 할아버지는 큰 썰매가 필요해

translation.en: I still can't find my reindeer...
translation.ko: 혹시 아직도 사슴들을 못 찾은 거니?

translation.en: Super Monsters,
can you use your super powers to help Santa fly his sleigh?
translation.ko: 얘들아, 너희가 초능력을 써서 썰매를 끌어 줄 수 있겠니?

translation.en: -We've been trying! -Drac pulled...
translation.ko: - 안 그래도 해 봤어요 - 드락이 끌고

translation.en: -And Spike helped push. -Cleo added her wind power...
translation.ko: - 스파이크가 미는 걸 도와주고 - 클레오가 바람도 불어 주고

translation.en: And Katya used her magic!
Oh, dear. If all of you working together didn't help, I don't know what will.
translation.ko: 저런 너희가 힘을 합쳤는데도 안 된다면 어떻게 하지?

translation.en: I do! You already know how to work together...
translation.ko: 제가 알아요! 힘을 합치는 방법은 아니까 이렇게 하면 같이 날 수 있어요

translation.en: but this will help you fly together.
translation.ko: 힘을 합치는 방법은 아니까 이렇게 하면 같이 날 수 있어요

translation.en: First, we'll need a really strong, stretchy rope.
translation.ko: 우선 아주 강하고 유연한 줄이 필요해요

translation.en: Oh! Instead of stretchy rope, how about stretchy vines?
translation.ko: 유연한 줄 대신 유연한 줄기는 어때?

translation.en: May I?
Yeah! [laughs]
[Zoe] Perfect!
Ooh, ooh! Can I drive?
Super Monsters, let's fly!
[Santa] Ho, ho, ho! It's working!
-[Esme] Well done! -[Igor] It works!
Now everyone in Pitchfork Pines will get their Christmas presents!
translation.ko: 이제 쇠스랑 숲 친구들이 모두 선물을 받을 수 있겠어요

translation.en: I hope so,
translation.ko: 그러면 좋겠지만 해가 뜨기 전에 이 많은 선물을

translation.en: but I might not be able to deliver all the presents before the sun comes up.
translation.ko: 그러면 좋겠지만 해가 뜨기 전에 이 많은 선물을 전부 나눠 주긴 힘들 것 같구나

translation.en: -But you have to! -I'll try my best, Frankie.
translation.ko: 하지만 해야 해요 최선을 다해 보마, 프랭키

translation.en: But climbing down chimneys takes a lot of time.
translation.ko: 하지만 굴뚝으로 들어가는 게 시간이 오래 걸리거든

translation.en: Oh! I can use my zombie powers to help! Then you won't need the chimneys.
translation.ko: 제가 좀비 파워로 도와드릴게요 굴뚝으로 안 가셔도 돼요

translation.en: I can use my mega-strength to carry the bag of presents!
translation.ko: 제가 메가 파워를 써서 선물을 들고 갈게요

translation.en: And I'll use my werewolf speed
to help put the presents under the trees fast, fast, fast!
translation.ko: 잽싸게 트리 밑에 선물을 놓고 올게요, 빨리빨리요!

translation.en: Oh, ho, ho, ho! Sounds like we have a plan.
[all] We're going to save Christmas!
Oh, no! The roof's too steep to land.
The sleigh will slide right off.
But if we land on the ground, someone might see us.
translation.ko: 하지만 땅에 세우면 누가 볼지도 몰라

translation.en: It'll spoil the surprise.
It's OK, Spike. Vida's with us.
This way, Santa!
Let's go, let's go!
♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
♪ Oh, what fun is it to ride On a one-horse open sleigh ♪
translation.ko: 우리 썰매 빨리 달려 종소리 울려라

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
♪ Oh, what fun is it to ride On a one-horse open sleigh ♪
translation.ko: 종소리 울려라, 종소리 울려 기쁜 노래 부르면서 빨리 달리자

translation.en: ♪ Dashing through the snow In a one-horse open sleigh ♪
♪ Through the fields we go Laughing all the way ♪
♪ Bells on bobtail ring Making spirits bright ♪
♪ What fun it is to ride and sing A sleighing song tonight ♪
♪ Oh, jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way! ♪
♪ Oh, what fun is it to ride In a one-horse open sleigh ♪
We did it! We delivered presents to everyone.
Well done, Super Monsters! You saved Christmas in Pitchfork Pines!
translation.ko: 정말 잘했다, 얘들아 너희가 아이들과 쇠스랑 숲의 크리스마스를 구했어

translation.en: Oh, there you are! I know you were having fun,
but did you forget we have an important job to do?
translation.ko: 오늘은 우리가 해야 할 중요한 일이 있었잖니

translation.en: If it hadn't been for the Super Monsters,
Christmas in Pitchfork Pines would have been ruined.
Thank you for all your help, Super Monsters.
I couldn't have done it without you.
Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas!
[all] Merry Christmas, Santa!
What an awesome night!
And it just got awesome! Look!
translation.ko: 아직 멋있는 게 더 남았어, 봐!

translation.en: [Super Monsters] Presents!
Aww, Santa gave Henri a new cat toy!
translation.ko: 산타 할아버지가 앙리에게 고양이 장난감을 주셨어

translation.en: And he gave Glorb a Teddy Bat!
And he gave us the best gift we could ever wish for!
translation.ko: 우리한테도 세상에서 가장 좋은 선물을 주셨고 말이야

translation.en: -How do you know? -You haven't even opened them yet.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 아니? - 아직 열어 보지도 않았잖아

translation.en: Oh, we know those presents are going to be great!
But the best present was being able to work together...
translation.ko: 최고의 선물은 우리가 함께 힘을 합쳐서...

translation.en: and help Santa save Christmas!
Now that's what the holiday spirit is all about!
translation.ko: 이런 게 바로 진정한 크리스마스 분위기지!

translation.en: It certainly is!
[all] Sun up! Super Monsters!
Merry Christmas, everyone!
♪ La la la la la la Super Monsters ♪
♪ Super Monsters ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
♪ In Pitchfork Pines we learn And help each other grow ♪
♪ There's magic in twilight That's when we start to glow ♪
♪ Sun down Monsters up! ♪
♪ I'm Drac, flying fast ♪
♪ Cleo, wind power Spike, dragon clouds ♪
♪ Zoe, zombie vision Lobo, super speed ♪
♪ Katya, magic spells Frankie, stomp ♪
